show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: August 2, 2010
content:
Host Ellen Kamhi PhD, RN www.naturalnurse.com interviews Dr. Atul and Rupa Shah . Both are MDâ€™s with degrees in Allopathic medicine.
They are a husband and wife team who perform advanced research in Natural Medicine, and offer a wide array of healing technologies.
These include Himalaya Flower Remedies, Isotherapy, Electromagnetic Pollution and Environmental Protection Devices, Environmental stress, Vastu (Indian Feng shui), and many other modalities.
They are frequently invited to deliver guest lectures at various national and International conferences and seminars on alternative medicines.
They have been frequently interviewed by the press and have been on television to talk about their work.
They regularly work with and ship information and healing modalities to people in the United States, as well as internationally.
CONTACT: www.aumhimalaya.com
